* Bonus
-------

This app is CPU bound rather than I/O bound. The threads are fully utilized; one thread per physical CPU core minus one thread for reading the file is optimal based on my tests. If threads could be blocked by I/O, performance might benefit from increasing the number of threads beyond the number of physical cores.
